title: Blue essence gone
body: Please solve this problem. WHEN I LOGGED IN and it showed i got around 25000 blue essence but i don't know how to claim it. After a sec everything has gone. Like WTF????? plz solve this bug.,...

replies.body: You don't get your rewards on log-in, but from completing the preseason reward missions (play a matchmade game, win or lose). You'll get all of your rewards granted except your BE. The Rune Collector missions grants Orbs that you have to open in Loot first.

You have to go at the loot and claim your blue essence i think :)
1.
